trans-unit.source: Defines common user interface (UI) properties used by ASP.NET <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 定義由 ASP.NET <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項使用的通用使用者介面 (UI) 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface provides several UI-oriented properties that enhance the user experience of working with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面提供幾個 UI 導向屬性，加強使用者體驗，使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you create controls that derive from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you get an implementation of all the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface, because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立衍生自基底的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別，取得中的所有屬性的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別會實作這個介面。

trans-unit.source: You can use existing user controls, ASP.NET controls, or custom server controls that do not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class as part of a Web Parts application, and they can also use these UI-oriented properties declared by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用現有的使用者控制項、 ASP.NET 控制項或自訂伺服器控制項，不會繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別做為一部分的 Web 組件應用程式，而且它們也可以使用這些宣告的 UI 導向屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面。

trans-unit.source: If you place existing server controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, at run time they are wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將現有的伺服器控制項中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，在執行階段，它們會包裝與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, it enables existing server controls to act as true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and it adds to them the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別，它可讓現有的伺服器控制項，以做為 true<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項並將它們的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面。

trans-unit.source: If you place server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in zones, they can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties at run time, and you can also declare values for those properties on server controls in the markup of the page (in page persistence format).
trans-unit.target: 如果您將伺服器控制項不<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項，它們可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>屬性在執行的階段，而且您也可以宣告 （以頁面持續性格式） 網頁的標記中的伺服器控制項上的這些屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: However, because these properties are only available to the server controls at run time, design-time coding features such as IntelliSense do not recognize <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties that are declared on server controls.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為這些屬性則只有在執行階段可以使用的伺服器控制項，程式碼撰寫設計階段功能如 IntelliSense 無法辨識<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>伺服器控制項宣告的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Declared properties on these controls still work when you load the page, but Microsoft Visual Studio does not recognize the properties as valid at design time.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入頁面，但是 Microsoft Visual Studio 無法辨識屬性為有效設計階段時，仍可運作這些控制項上的宣告的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties to existing server and user controls to enhance the design-time user experience, you can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface in a server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>至現有的伺服器和增強設計階段的使用者經驗的使用者控制項的屬性，您可以實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>伺服器控制項中的介面。

trans-unit.source: Perhaps the main reason to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is for controls that do not support the use of expando (custom) properties.
trans-unit.target: 可能是實作的主要原因<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面是不支援使用 （自訂） expando 屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Expando properties are strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor> interface.
trans-unit.target: Expando 屬性是字串，其中可以加入至類別以動態方式為屬性，藉由<xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor>介面。

trans-unit.source: Controls that implement this interface, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and its children, can use expando properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些控制項實作這個介面，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>類別和其子系中，可以使用 expando 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, all ASP.NET server controls, custom controls that derive from them, Web user controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls support the use of expando properties.
trans-unit.target: 因此，所有 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項、 自訂控制項都衍生自這些 Web 使用者控制項，以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項都支援使用 expando 屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: But custom controls that inherit directly from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class do not support expando properties.
trans-unit.target: 但自訂控制項的直接繼承自基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別不支援 expando 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Thus, if you declare these controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>, you will not be able to declare the common <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties on the controls, properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您宣告內的這些控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>，不能宣告一般<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>屬性上的控制項屬性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use these properties with such controls, you must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這些屬性，這類控制項，您必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface in a user control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>使用者控制項中的介面。

trans-unit.source: This is a simple implementation that shows minimally how to implement the properties.
trans-unit.target: 這是使用最低限度示範如何實作屬性的簡單實作。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows the user control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會顯示使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The user control implements all the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface, plus two additional public properties tied to controls in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項實作的所有屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面，再加上兩個額外的公用屬性繫結至控制項的使用者介面中。

trans-unit.source: The two custom properties each use the `Personalizable` attribute, which enables the values in those properties to be saved across browser sessions.
trans-unit.target: 兩個自訂屬性每個使用`Personalizable`屬性，可讓這些屬性，以儲存跨瀏覽器工作階段中的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implementation, all the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface are implemented as personalizable as well, though they are not in this code example.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別實作中，所有屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會實作為可個人化，但它們不在這個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows the Web page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分示範裝載使用者控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The page has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, within which the user control is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 頁面具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制，請在參考的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: Notice that several of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface's property values are set declaratively in the markup for the user control, which enables it to both behave and appear similar to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control at design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，有幾個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面的屬性值將以宣告方式設定的使用者控制項，讓它能夠同時行為，並出現類似的標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制在設計階段和執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If you load the page in a browser, you can use the UI on the page to demonstrate the ability to programmatically change the values of the implemented <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> properties at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果您載入瀏覽器中的，您可以示範以程式設計方式變更的值實作的功能頁面上使用 UI<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>屬性在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: When you change some of the property values, the changes are not evident on the page, but are visible in the page source (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property), or are stored in the application's state data (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 當您變更某些屬性值時，所做的變更不明顯的頁面上，但會顯示在網頁原始檔 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性)，或會儲存在應用程式的狀態資料 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart" /> interface, either on custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls or server controls, because the base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> class already implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: 通常您不需要實作<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart" />介面，請在自訂<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項或伺服器控制項，因為基底<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />類別已實作的介面。

trans-unit.source: Custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls, and other server controls that are placed in <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zones, can use all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項和其他伺服器控制項放置在<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" />區域，可以使用所有<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: The main reason to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart" /> interface yourself, whether in a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or another server control, is if you want to change the default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 若要實作的主要原因<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart" />介面，在自訂中是否<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項或其他伺服器控制項，如果您想要變更預設實作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to provide default values for some of the properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以針對某些屬性提供預設值。

trans-unit.source: Another reason to implement the interface in a user or server control is so that the design-time experience of working with these properties on the control will be enhanced.
trans-unit.target: 使用者或伺服器控制項中實作介面的另一個原因是，因此將會增強控制項上使用這些屬性的設計階段經驗。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定至影像的 URL，該影像表示控制項目錄中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示至影像的 URL，該影像用於表示目錄中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件的應用程式通常會提供使用者可以將頁面加入的控制項類別目錄 （或清單）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>在控制項上的屬性包含的目錄中出現時，表示控制項之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的完整原始程式碼中的範例 > 一節找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會示範如何實作使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式設定的值的使用者控制項中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>當使用者從選項按鈕，在頁面上，選取適當的屬性名稱的屬性會設定新的值在文字方塊中，並然後按一下 [**更新**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, and how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property is set declaratively on the control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分示範使用者如何控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項，以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>控制項上以宣告方式設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that because there is no catalog of Web Parts controls provided with this example, you cannot see the actual effect of setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為沒有提供此範例中的 Web 組件控制項的類別目錄，所以無法設定這個屬性的實際影響。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定摘要說明控制項功能的簡短片語，用於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的工具提示和目錄。

trans-unit.source: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
trans-unit.target: 字串，簡要概括控制項的功能。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>屬性值通常用於為描述性字串中提供的清單的類別目錄的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，並為工具提示控制項的標題列中。

trans-unit.source: The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的內容中會出現工具提示使用者將滑鼠指標置於上控制項的標題列中的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的完整原始程式碼中的範例 > 一節找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會示範如何實作使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式設定的值的使用者控制項中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>當使用者從選項按鈕，在頁面上，選取適當的屬性名稱的屬性會設定新的值在文字方塊中，並然後按一下 [**更新**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, and how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A> property is set declaratively on the control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分示範使用者如何控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項，以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Description%2A>控制項上以宣告方式設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that you can see the value of this property by positioning your mouse pointer over the title text in the control's title bar, after you have loaded the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您可以將滑鼠指標放在控制項的標題列中的標題文字之上之後在瀏覽器網頁載入, 看到這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also experiment with changing the property value programmatically at run time by loading the Web page and using the provided user interface (UI) to change the property value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以試驗變更屬性值，以程式設計方式在執行階段載入網頁，並使用提供的使用者介面 (UI)，若要變更屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that is concatenated with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title" /> property value to form a complete title for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title" /> 屬性值串連的字串，組成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的完整標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，做為控制項的副標題。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A> property is used to return a default subtitle string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is appended to the control's title in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性用來傳回預設副標題字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>附加至控制項的標題，標題列中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you provide a default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A> property in a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供的預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>中實作的控制項屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面、 Web 組件控制項集合會自動將它附加到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>在執行階段控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的完整原始程式碼中的範例 > 一節找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會示範如何實作使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the property is read-only and is meant to be used to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the main title of a control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，此屬性是唯讀，並要用來提供預設副標題附加到主控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, and how the writable properties from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> are set declaratively on the control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分示範使用者如何控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項，以及如何從可寫入的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>控制項上以宣告方式設定。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, note that the default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A> property, which was set in the user control's implementation code, is appended to the title in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請注意，預設值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>屬性，設定使用者控制項的實作程式碼中，會附加至控制項的標題列中的標題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控制項標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The visible title text in a control's title bar is set by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項的標題列中顯示的標題文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未提供控制項的標題，自動設定的 Web 組件控制項計算預設字串的標題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string.
trans-unit.target: 此外，很可能提供預設副標題附加此標題字串。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Subtitle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的完整原始程式碼中的範例 > 一節找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會示範如何實作使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式設定的值的使用者控制項中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>當使用者從選項按鈕，在頁面上，選取適當的屬性名稱的屬性會設定新的值在文字方塊中，並然後按一下 [**更新**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, and how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A> property is set declaratively on the control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分示範使用者如何控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項，以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.Title%2A>控制項上以宣告方式設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a Web Parts control in the control's own title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的 URL，用來表示控制項所擁有標題列中的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示至影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property provides a way to associate an icon with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性可用來建立關聯的圖示與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The icon appears in the control's own title bar.
trans-unit.target: 圖示會出現在控制項標題列中。

trans-unit.source: For thematic consistency, application developers might want to make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 參考書一致性，應用程式開發人員可能會想要使這個圖示類似於代表目錄中的 Web 組件控制項的控制項的映像 (映像中參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 因為它在 Web 組件控制項集合，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性可變更影像或圖示出現在控制項的標題列中的使用者個人化。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的完整原始程式碼中的範例 > 一節找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會示範如何實作使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式設定的值的使用者控制項中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>當使用者從選項按鈕，在頁面上，選取適當的屬性名稱的屬性會設定新的值在文字方塊中，並然後按一下 [**更新**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, and how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> property is set declaratively on the control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分示範使用者如何控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項，以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>控制項上以宣告方式設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not provide the URL to a real image, a placeholder for the icon appears in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否您未提供實際影像的 URL，圖示的預留位置會出現在標題列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之補充資訊的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a URL to more information about a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之詳細資訊的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a URL to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property, the title of the control becomes a link.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性、 控制項的標題會變成連結。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this property is to provide a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性的用途是提供便利的方式，讓使用者可存取其他控制項的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The additional information could provide copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the control's purpose.
trans-unit.target: 其他資訊可以提供著作權資料、 連絡資料、 建立者的控制項或摘要控制項的用途的相關詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you would not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property to link to Help content.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不會將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性連結至說明內容。

trans-unit.source: The best way to provide a link to Help for a control is to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 說明提供連結，是使用控制項的最佳方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的完整原始程式碼中的範例 > 一節找到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會示範如何實作使用者控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example demonstrates the method in the user control that programmatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property when a user selects the appropriate property name from the radio buttons on the page, sets a new value in the text box, and then clicks the **Update** button.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式設定的值的使用者控制項中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>當使用者從選項按鈕，在頁面上，選取適當的屬性名稱的屬性會設定新的值在文字方塊中，並然後按一下 [**更新**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example shows how the user control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart> interface is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, and how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A> property is set declaratively on the control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分示範使用者如何控制可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart>介面會參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項，以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPart.TitleUrl%2A>控制項上以宣告方式設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not provide a URL to a real page, and then a user clicks the link in the title bar, an error message appears.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否您未提供實際的頁面上的 URL，然後使用者按一下標題列中的連結，顯示錯誤訊息。
